Package org.ginsim.servicegui.tool.regulatorygraphanimation

Class RegulatoryAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel
      • org.ginsim.servicegui.tool.regulatorygraphanimation.RegulatoryAnimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ListModel, GraphGUIListener
    public class RegulatoryAnimator
extends AbstractListModel
implements GraphGUIListener
    Main class of the animator plugin. use the animate static method to run the animation on a dynamic or regulatory graph: It performs some checks and run the GUI once everything looks OK.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        protected void revertPath​(int index)
        rewind the path. basically revert all color changes made on the dyngraph and eventually apply back the first ones!
        Parameters:
        index - index of the last node to remove.

      • graphChanged

        public void graphChanged​(Graph g,
                         GraphChangeType type,
                         Object data)
        Description copied from interface: GraphGUIListener
        The graph data was changed. This method is used to forward change events (see GraphListener) to the GUI. Listeners should react by refreshing the GUI when needed but should not change the graph.
        Specified by:
        graphChanged in interface GraphGUIListener
        Parameters:
        g - the graph
        type - the type
        data - object data
